channel.title: [PI] [Hybrid PvP] Uncut Onyx while mining
channel.description: How can i make it so when you mine there is a rare chance of getting an Uncut Onyx? (ID = 6571)

item.title: [PI] [Hybrid PvP] Uncut Onyx while mining
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

chaske1:

Hmm yea pretty true, but one guy on the server i code on, had 7 uncut onyx’s in 30 mins-60mins. Ik that’s rare, but since ammy of fury is donor stuff on the server, i want it to be more rare :s

Then just increase the number inside the parentheses on if (Misc.random(25) == 10), example: if (Misc.random(50) == 10)

It’s pretty much a random number generator. It chooses a random number up to 50 and if that number is 10, you’ll get the onyx gem.

Think of it in this perspective: with the above code containing a cycle of 50, about every 50 ores you have a really good chance of getting an onyx. Obviously too low for what you sound like you need. Just adjust it to your liking.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] [Hybrid PvP] Uncut Onyx while mining
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Well, you could do this:

if (Misc.random(25) == 10) { c.getItems().addItem(RANDOM_GEMS[(int)(RANDOM_GEMS.length * Math.random())], 1); c.sendMessage("You find a gem!"); } else if (Misc.random(10) <= 3) { c.getItems().addItem(6571, 1); c.sendMessage("You find and Uncut Onyx!"); }

Read full topic

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:4, topic:397930”]Meh, it’s already pretty rare. First of all its

, which is already uncommon, and plus it has to compete with 5 other gems? I don’t know how much rarer you want it to get. :P[/quote]
Hmm yea pretty true, but one guy on the server i code on, had 7 uncut onyx’s in 30 mins-60mins. Ik that’s rare, but since ammy of fury is donor stuff on the server, i want it to be more rare :s

item.title: [PI] [Hybrid PvP] Uncut Onyx while mining
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Go into src/models/players/skills/Mining.java. With the other public int’s at the top add this:

Now search for:

public void mineOre() { if (c.getItems().addItem(oreType,1)) {

Add this under that:

if (Misc.random(25) == 10) { c.getItems().addItem(RANDOM_GEMS[(int)(RANDOM_GEMS.length * Math.random())], 1); c.sendMessage("You find a gem!"); }

Cheers.

Read full topic
